Due to an unexpected confusion, Tadeo, a bricklayer dreamer will be led by a famous archaeologist on an expedition in Peru. With the help of his faithful dog Jeff, the intrepid teacher Sara, a parrot mute and his friends will try to save the legendary Lost City of the Incas of a group of hunting treasures of evil. Tadeo always wanted to become a famous archaeologist and adventurer. However spends his days dreaming between cranes and cement work where he works. The opportunity to realize their dreams is when his friend, a renowned archaeologist, receives a mysterious stone tablet, the key that leads to the lost city of Paititi and his legendary treasure. One point of the trip, the archaeologist has an accident and who should replace him on the expedition is Tadeo. Upon arrival in Peru, Tadeo Oddyseus discovers a large corporation specialized in hunting treasure which is also behind the trail of the lost city of Paititi ... and are willing to do anything to find her.
